outputs.output_descr: The project aims at reducing Lesotho’s energy related CO2 emissions by promoting renewable and low Green House Gases (GHG) technologies as a substitute for fossil fuels utilised in rural areas of the country.

project_descr: The project aims at reducing Lesotho’s energy related CO2 emissions by promoting renewable and low Green House Gases (GHG) technologies as a substitute for fossil fuels utilised in rural areas of the country.
project_title: Renewable Energy Rural Electrification in Lesotho
